array.name: cool_recipes
array.item:
Step 1: Buy some beets
Step 2: Buy like, one leek.
Step 3: Clean leeks. Also beets.
Step 4: Please beet on leek.
Step 5: Serve

Step 1: Buy a cantaloupe.
Step 2: Cut cantaloupe in half.
Step 3: Put half of cantaloupe on your head.
Step 4: Imagine.
Step 1: Buy some sort of gourd.\nStep 2: Light gourd on fire.\nStep 3: Add magnesium.
